paragraphs: The coin-barons of House Hlaalu are pleased with your progress, but there is much left undone. Enclosed is a letter of credit that should keep you well-funded for now.

One matter of consternation persists–Dratha's health. So long as that witch draws breath, our plans remain stymied. Your kinsmen in House Telvanni lack the Hlaalu's attention to detail, but even the most foolish mage cannot be tricked forever. We must redouble our efforts.
Do your part and all accounts will be paid. House Hlaalu shall welcome you, and Tel Mora will be yours to rule.
